A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It's a shame what they did to Luke Skywalker\, the character deserved better than this and it's upsetting to see a childhood hero disrespected like this. What a horrible way to end the Luke Skywalker Saga......
There where some awesome parts of this movie\, great battles and cool new planets and some cool new characters.....Ray\, Ren and Poe where great....
But NONE of the questions everyone has had since Awakens where anwsered\, it makes me feel like I wasted time getting excited about this movie. What a waste of characters Snoke and Phantasm where....
Makes me wish George Lucas was still in charge\, j would have loved to see the rest of his vision.
